entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
